title: The most delicious Alfredo recipe I've ever eaten! Simple and tasty!
description: Reteta de creveti in sos de unt cu usturoi se prepara usor, rapid si va deveni rapid una dintre favoritele voastre.
content:
Ingredients:


  • ​1 tbsp of oil
  • 450g prawns
  • Salt
  • Black Pepper
  • 1 onion
  • Fresh Parsley
  • 1 garlic whole
  • 200g of wide pasta
  • 2 tbsp of butter
  • 80ml of white wine / 1/2 lemon juice
  • 470ml of heavy cream
  • Sweet Paprika
  • 70g or more parmesan


Preparation:


  • ​Preheat a pan to medium/high and add 1 tbsp of oil
  • 450g prawns, peeled and deveined
  • Season the prawns lightly with salt and black pepper
  • Sprinkle paprika
  • Cut 1 onion into small pieces
  • Cook separately 200g of pasta adding 1 tbsp of salt
  • Fry the prawns 1-2 minutes on each side until fully cooked
  • Season the prawns again lightly with salt and black pepper
  • Sprinkle paprika
  • Cut into small pieces a handful of parsley
  • Remove the prawns into a separate plate
  • In same pan add 2 tbsp of butter over medium/high heat
  • Add onion and cook until transparent
  • Add garlic as pasta and fry for another minute
  • Add 80ml of white wine (substitute 1/2 lemon juice)
  • Let it cook for 2 more minutes
  • Stir in 470ml of heavy cream and cook for another 2-3 minutes
  • Season with salt and black pepper
  • Add 1/4 tbsp of sweet paprika
  • Take the pan off the heat
  • Grate 70g parmesan cheese (or add to taste)
  • Stir until creamy and smooth
  • Do not boil, otherwise the cheese will separate from the cream
  • Drain the pasta but do not rinse (this will help the sauce stick to the pasta)
  • Place the sauce and pasta along with the prawns in a plate and mixed all these
  • Garnish with parsley

And, Bon Apetitte


Video:
